Description: This JSON file provides a data dictionary for the handedness data contained in the corresponding TSV file.

write_1.Description: writing hand: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

draw_1.Description: drawing hand: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

sewingneedle_1.Description: sewing needle hand: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

scissors_1.Description: scissors holding: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

toothbrush_1.Description: toothbrush holding: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

knife_1.Description: knife holding: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

spoon_1.Description: spoon holding: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

mop_1.Description: mopping floor upper hand: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

lighter_1.Description: lighter holding: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

jar_lid_1.Description: jar lid preferred hand for opening: -1 = left exclusive +1 = right exclusive

hand_index.Description: handedness index transformed -100 to +100 where -100 is lefthanded and +100 is righthanded
